class.name: OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing
class.brief_description: An object for retrieving submesh data from [code]XR_ANDROID_scene_meshing[/code] extension.

method.name: are_normals_enabled
method.description: Returns whether this instance was initialized with normals enabled in [method initialize].

method.name: get_semantic_label_set
method.description: Returns the [enum SemanticLabelSet] used when this instance was initialized in [method initialize].

method.name: get_submesh_data
method.description: Get a [Dictionary] that maps all found submesh uuids ([StringName]) to [OpenXRAndroidSceneSubmeshData]s.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initialize this [OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing] instance. Only one [OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing] is needed, however creating multiple is okay. [param semantic_label_set] is one of the [enum SemanticLabelSet]s returned by [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshingExtensionWrapper.get_supported_semantic_label_sets]. When [param enable_normals] is true, then the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_NORMAL] index in [method OpenXRAndroidSceneSubmeshData.get_arrays] will be populated.

constants.constant: One of the labels that can be used in [method initialize]. This label means [method OpenXRAndroidSceneSubmeshData.get_vertex_semantics] will always return an empty array.
One of the labels that can be used in [method initialize]. This label means [method OpenXRAndroidSceneSubmeshData.get_vertex_semantics] may return a non-empty array.
